issue.title: misskey.io
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version ver 4.1.53 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://misskey.io/@kureharu_stk https://misskey.io/tags/%E6%B0%97%E3%81%8C%E7%8B%82%E3%81%A3%E3%81%9F%E3%81%A8%E3%81%8D%E3%81%AB%E6%8A%BC%E3%81%99%E3%83%9C%E3%82%BF%E3%83%B3 https://misskey.io/@itiradi/pages/1557466961730 ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots I tried with #142719 but I could not completely hide ad.
screenshots ![](https://i.slow.pics/lnAE14RG.png) ![](https://i.slow.pics/l0Zsts36.png) ![](https://i.ibb.co/2t1JLWt/image.png)

### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Google Play: id.co.cimbniaga.mobile.android
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=id.co.cimbniaga.mobile.android](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Did.co.cimbniaga.mobile.android) ### Comment Username: @christantoan > The app detects if an AdGuard certificate is installed in User store (though I haven't checked with other certificate installed there). It's okay if the cert is installed to the System store (i.e. deleting the certificate from User store but not reboot yet to apply changes to Zygisk module). > > I have also reported via ticket #724593. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 브라우저 툴바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 통해 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

issue.title: Google Play: id.co.cimbniaga.mobile.android
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=id.co.cimbniaga.mobile.android](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Did.co.cimbniaga.mobile.android) ### Comment Username: @christantoan > The app detects if an AdGuard certificate is installed in User store (though I haven't checked with other certificate installed there). It's okay if the cert is installed to the System store (i.e. deleting the certificate from User store but not reboot yet to apply changes to Zygisk module). > > I have also reported via ticket #724593. ### Screenshots
